query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_preferences (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  tenantId INT NOT NULL,
  activeOAuthTokenId INT,
  defaultUploadView VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'dashboard',
  theme VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'light',
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX user_preferences_user_unique (userId),
  INDEX user_preferences_tenant_idx (tenantId)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 24ruGQuiASWpGv5.root --database gtMbYvvduSqhsHRvj39YWw --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_preferences (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  tenantId INT NOT NULL,
  activeOAuthTokenId INT,
  defaultUploadView VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'dashboard',
  theme VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'light',
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX user_preferences_user_unique (userId),
  INDEX user_preferences_tenant_idx (tenantId)
);
